works.description: This person is pretending to be Bryci from bryci.com. They are stealing my copyrighted images that I own in the profile as well as imitating Bryci herself. I have had false facebook profiles for this person removed ten different times. She is located in Mexico, outside of lawsuit option so she does not care. the only way to get rid of her is to ban her ip address. if you go to http://bryci.org you will find the images she has stolen, the real Bryci is on Twitter at @Bryci and she is fine being that she is the real Bryci... but BryciXimena  is a faker stealing images, pretending to be Bryci.

This is the same faker as above, this time pretending to be Ava Dawn using my copyrighted images stolen from Avadawn.com. Again, same person stealing. Check the ips you'll find it's the same person. I would ask you ban both @AlexaGxo and @BryciXimena
